fields.name: CasePlanDetails
fields.fieldText:
Case Plan Details﻿


Plan Name: {!curCasePlan.Name}

value.stringValue: Link to which Case Record Type?

fields.name: noteCaseRecordType
fields.fieldText: Each Case Record Type can have several Case Plans associated with it, but only one can be Active. Set the Active Case Plan for a record type with a Custom Setting.

fields.name: DisplayToolTip
fields.fieldText: When you use a Case Plans, you define a particular order for the different status values of the Case Record type. The Case Plan will then follow that order.

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: No Case Plan found. Please Create One.

fields.name: ErrorMessageNoID
fields.fieldText: Please select a record from the table.

fields.name: ErrorNoId
fields.fieldText: You must select a single Case Plan.

fields.name: SimilarCasePlanMessage
fields.fieldText: A Case Plan already exist with this name.

fields.name: SimilarCasePlanWhenUpdate
fields.fieldText: A Case Plan already exists with this name.
